snippet: Ms. Pelosi, the House minority leader, argued to Mr. Ryan, the speaker, that “defending our democracy is more important than any advantage or disadvantage in this election.”...
abstract: House Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi urges Speaker Paul D Ryan to bar Republicans from using documents hacked from Democratic National Committee by Russian intelligence agencies; Pelosi says Democrats and Republicans should stand united against Russian cyberattacks some see as possible attempt to manipulate presidential election.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Pelosi, the House minority leader, argued to Mr. Ryan, the speaker, that “defending our democracy is more important than any advantage or disadvantage in this election.”

headline.main: Nancy Pelosi Urges Paul Ryan to Ban Republicans From Using Hacked Documents
headline.print_headline: Pelosi Urges Ryan to Bar Republicans From Using Hacked Material
